backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing audio-related feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend Valentine-themed components and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide providing steps and console checks to diagnose audio playback issues in deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining Valentine-themed color variables, dark mode values, and UI base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, metadata, and the root mount point for the app.
frontend/README_AUDIO_SETUP.md: Documentation describing how to configure local and external audio modes and how to reference audio files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application assembling the Valentine experience, handling intro overlay, background music, visuals, and page content.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates animated floating heart elements unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/RosePe: Creates dynamic falling rose petals or static emojis when reduced-motion is requested.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Rotati: Cycles through cute one‑liner messages with hover‑pause and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Interactive component that reveals a Valentine surprise, switching from a gift button to a coupon book with a playlist link.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useInt: Custom hook that initializes ambient and confirmation audio, manages mute state, and handles interaction-based playback unlocking.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Manages background music playback with preflight validation, error handling, and mute control tied to component activity.
Intro overlay with audio controls and an evasive 'No' button, guiding the user to accept before proceeding.
frontend/src/deployDiagnostics.ts: Diagnostics module that logs startup details and tracks resource load errors, media failures, and unhandled rejections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a Valentine-themed color palette with custom components and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/assetBase.ts: Generates asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL, ensuring correct paths for SPA deployments.
frontend/src/utils/audioPreflight.ts: Performs validation of audio URLs using HEAD/GET requests, detecting HTML fallbacks, CORS issues, and non-audio responses.
frontend/src/utils/resolveAudioUrl.ts: Resolves audio sources by passing through absolute URLs or converting relative paths via getAssetUrl, with validation against malformed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended colors mapped to CSS variables, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and new requests related to supporting external MP3 audio streaming.
